message: Added raw response logging for each Apple Music endpoint. This will show the actual API response structure in console. Also fixed Re-import button height. Please deploy commit a7fd5f8.
feature_summary: Raw API response logging for debugging
debugging_notes: Console will now show: 'Heavy rotation raw response:', 'Recently played raw response:', 'Recent tracks raw response:', 'Recently added raw response:' - this will reveal if endpoints return data or empty
